title: Interpretation of dreams of a large rat that attacked me for an unmarried woman in a dream and killed him for the sake of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large rat that attacked an unmarried woman in a dream and killed it according to Ibn Sirin. It is one of the unwanted dreams, as its interpretation is due to a bad interpretation and reflects the life of the dreamer. In addition, they are among the rodents that cause diseases and transmit them to humans. It should be noted that rats The viewer is disgusted and afraid. The events narrated by the fortuneteller as mentioned in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about mice for a single woman in a dream. There are many interpretations related to seeing mice in a dream for an unmarried woman, as her vision differs according to the events narrated by the fortuneteller upon her arrival in the dream. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is hitting a mouse forcefully on her Her head, this may be the interpretation that this unmarried girl will talk about something bad about someone and they should stop and not talk. We find that if an unmarried girl dreams that she is talking to a mouse as if she is incarnating as a person and talking to him, then this indicates the new friendship that she will establish. Soon, and God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of Umrah for a single woman with my mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin explained various interpretations related to seeing mice in a dream, as seeing mice carries a reliable interpretation and generally indicates an immoral woman who transmits evil to the dreamer, For example: Ibn Sirin, in his interpretation of seeing mice in a dream, referred to something that robs him of his rights or lends him his life and body, and God knows best. In the case in which we saw a lot of mice, this refers to the thief who robs the fortuneteller and tries to lure him until he is surprised and then takes him, and it is likely that he will The thief is a woman. In addition, seeing many colored mice in a dream indicates the succession and succession of days and that the person may go through a period of fluctuations. If one sees that he has a mouse, this may mean that he has a servant who helps him relieve himself, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of seeing mice in a dream and killing them. Killing mice in a dream is one of the bad visions. In the eyes of the dreamer, they carry bad signs and harm, and a sign that his life will be taken care of and he will return to God Almighty. We give you some interpretations: If a married woman sees that she is killing a mouse in her dream, this is evidence of... Bad reputation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It is possible that eating rat meat in a dream indicates many bad deeds that he commits, and therefore the vision here is a warning message to return to God, so it is necessary to seek forgiveness. Some believe that the dream of killing rats in a dream is for a woman An unmarried woman indicates that she will get married soon, God willing. As for seeing an unmarried woman killing a mouse in a dream, this is a sign of taking care of the people around her, especially those who want to be associated with her, as they are cunning, deceitful, and deceitful people. However, if a pregnant woman sees that she is killing a mouse, it may be A sign that she feels some difficulties in pregnancy and childbirth, and God Almighty knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream about blindness with two eyes or one eye by Ibn Shaheen b

title: Interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Shark in a dream Seeing a shark in a dream has many interpretations that have been explained by scientists, and since some people have a bad background about seeing a shark, we will explain in detail in this article that it has other good connotations that vary according to the type and condition of the shark. Dreamer. Shark in a dream. Dreaming of a shark in a dream is interpreted to say that the dreamer will get a lot of good money in the coming days. Seeing a shark in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer has power and authority and that he has a high status among people in society. Sometimes it is interpreted Scientists consider sharks to be bad friends that surround God and he must stay away from them. Seeing sharks in the dreamer’s dream, and the water was clear and beautiful, indicates an abundance of food, and the end of anxiety and happiness that he enjoys in his life. But if a person sees that there are sharks in a dream If you attack him, this is a sign of the hypocrisy of those who surround him and are trying to conspire against him. Seeing someone in a dream attacking sharks indicates the crises and tribulations that he will face in the coming period and he must take all necessary precautions. Seeing sharks in a dream, biting the dreamer, symbolizes a lot of The sadness and grief that the dreamer is suffering from. The dreamer seeing that the shark cuts him off and takes him is evidence of the dreamer’s death. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is escaping from the shark while it is attacking him, this is a sign that he is suffering from some disease that has caused him a lot of trouble and pain. Some scholars interpreted the vision A shark attacks a person as evidence of their imprisonment and exposure to injustice. The shark in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a shark in a dream scattered around it, and this is evidence that the dreamer loves women and has many girls around him. Seeing a large number of sharks surrounding the dreamer in his dream symbolizes It indicates that he will have an abundance of money in the coming period, which will bring him great help and joy. But when the dreamer sees in his dream many sharks approaching him while swimming in the sea and this scene causes him panic and evil, this indicates that he will lose money and will not reach Goals that have been planned for a long time. Shark in a dream for Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi will explain to us that seeing sharks in a dream is a sign of the strength, power and money that the dreamer has in his life. Also, seeing sharks in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve his desired goals. A person’s dream of having sharks in his house indicates The abundance of food and the abundance of goodness in the home, in addition to the good news that he will be surprised in the coming season, God willing. Seeing a dead shark in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will achieve many of the goals he sought to achieve, in addition to his success in many upcoming matters, God willing. In general Seeing a shark swimming in a dream is a sign of good and pleasant news that the dreamer will soon be happy to hear. Shark in a dream for a single woman. A dream about a shark for an unmarried woman is interpreted as someone who has proposed to her, but is not suitable for her and is known

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new phone or buying a new phone in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about buying a new mobile phone in a dream and the meaning of buying a new phone in a dream through a website in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new mobile phone Buying a new mobile phone in a dream is a dream of many people in their dreams and the types of phones vary in the world. Among them are Apple phones, Samsung phones, Huawei phones, Xiaomi phones, Oppo phones, Realme phones. Honor phones, Nokia phones, Infinix phones, iPhone phones and other modern phones. Many people may dream in their sleep of buying a phone or breaking it or something bad happening to the mobile or anything related to the new iPhone. But does this dream have a clear interpretation or is it self-talk that has no interpretation? We will learn this in the following lines. Perhaps buying a cell phone in a dream is just self-talk, but if it turns out to be a dream, it can indicate many clues. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hearing a phone ring for singles Interpretation of dreams about a mobile phone call Interpretation of buying a new mobile phone in a dream Interpretation of a dream about buying a new phone indicates the viewer's good relationship with those he knows or knows from people. Interpretation of a dream about buying a phone in a dream can also be a sign of people's love for the viewer. Interpretation of buying a new phone in a dream can be a sign that you are benefiting from something because the origin of the purchase is a benefit. And the interpretation of a dream about buying a new phone is a sign of achieving the dreams and goals that the dreamer aspires to.. large- Leader-2-multi-114 {border: none! important; display: block! important; float: none! important; line-height: 0; margin-bottom: 15px! important; margin-left: 0!; margin-right: 0! important; margin-top: 15px! important; max-width: 100%! The interpretation of a dream about buying a new phone can be a sign of success at work or promotion and reaching a higher level of the viewer. Also, the interpretation of a dream about buying a new phone for a man indicates success and creating new relationships. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new phone The colors of phones in a dream are among the necessary things that must be taken into account, because they are among the necessary clues. Seeing a phone in black in a dream for a man is commendable, just as seeing a phone in white and pink for a woman is commendable. As for the interpretation of a dream about a yellow phone in a dream, it is not commendable and may indicate illness and anxiety. If the price of the phone is too expensive for the viewer to buy it, this may indicate a delay in the security that the viewer is waiting for. But if the price of the phone is low and within the viewer's reach, this may indicate that the viewer gets enough money. As for the interpretation of a dream about buying a new blue phone, it can symbolize fatigue and hardship, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about buying a new mobile phone for singles Interpretation of a dream about buying a new mobile phone for a single woman can be a sign of marriage, especially the red phone..leader-4-multi-118 {border: none! important; display: block! important; float: none! important; line-height: 0; ma

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dog bite in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a dog bite in a dream The scholars of Ibn Sirin differed in their interpretation and created many views and opinions that we will learn about during our article. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream Some people believe that a dog bite in a dream is something that is not worth searching for its interpretation, and others believe that it is a bad thing that causes Excessive fear and explains that it requires the following indicators: A dog bite in a dream is a danger that will come to you soon, you need to wake up and review your calculations about what you are doing. The meaning of animals in a dream indicates the human instinct that God created us, and this is not bad. Seeing a dog bite me in a dreamNarrated by the world of interpretation Muslim Ibn Sirin said that whoever sees a dog biting him during his sleep indicates that he will suffer severe harm from a relative, and these are some interpretations: When a girl sees that a dog has bitten her during her sleep, she is likely to betray her lover in the current period. Al-Nabulsi says: “If the dreamer sees a dog He bites him in a dream, this means that the dreamer will be harmed by the enemy and that he will soon be robbed, so he advises him to be careful. There is another indication that indicates that whoever sees a dog biting him is committing a repeated sin, so he must ask forgiveness from his Lord and repent to Him. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream for a single womanIf a woman sees For an unmarried woman in her dream that a dog bites her, this vision has many interpretations, and scholars have come to work on it, and it can be reached by knowing the person’s condition, as follows: If a single woman sees a dog running after her and some of them stop, this means that there are those who do not wish It is good for her. But if she sees that a black dog is doing this, this means that someone is trying to harm her and she must arrange all the owners around her to identify him. But if the dog is far from her and is white in color and has a good appearance, this means that someone close to her wishes her well and has good morals. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream for a pregnant woman. Several opinions came from Ibn Sirin regarding the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream, including the part related to a pregnant woman. He presented the following conclusions: Ibn Sirin said that a dog bite in a pregnant woman’s dream means that there are many obstacles and problems that she faces during pregnancy. The period of her pregnancy, especially during the period of childbirth, and God knows best. She also said: It indicates the hatred and malice that some hold for her. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream for a divorced woman. In the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream, a set of jurisprudence came from a group of scholars who differed in arriving at a common interpretation, Among them: A woman should know that if a dog comes to her in a dream and bites her, this indicates that her husband is cheating on her. But if the dog comes and bites her directly, this indicates the corruption of the people around her, as there is no longer someone she looks to to help her. If the dog is in the dream Gray, it means that one of her family members has wronged her, especially her father, brother, and husband, and that God will avenge him sooner or later. Interpretation of a dream about biting the palm of a hand: When the dreamer, male or female, sees in a dream that a dog approached him and bit him on the palm of his hand, this is his Many meanings, can be summarized in:

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a fire in the house in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man?  He was dreaming of a fire in the house and trying to put it out

preview.html: Seeing a fire in the house during a dream Fire is one of the things that many people fear, and when they see it in a dream, it indicates many different meanings and meanings, varying between good and evil. Sometimes it can be a sign of goodness and other times it can be so and through this article, we will learn about the best interpretations that appeared when we saw it burning in the house and its different meanings. Interpretation of a dream about a fire in the house for a man when he sees fire surrounding him from all sides, And he cannot overcome it, as this is a sign of many changes in the dreamer’s life, especially in the way of thinking or the appearance of something that will affect him in the future, and by God. The highest and most knowledgeable. If he sees him inside his house and it is eating its walls, then the house represents the owner of the vision, and according to what I got from the house, it is a change that will happen to him and leave a great impact on him. As for the effort expended in extinguishing it, and it was overwhelming in front of him, it is an indication of a desire not to change, or On the dreamer’s insistence on doing a certain thing or sin, and his adherence to it despite its presence. . From many circumstances that help him change himself. Seeing a large group of small fire extinguishers is evidence of despair, sadness, anxiety in the future, and rejection of good opportunities. Interpretation of a dream about a fire breaking out in the house, but when you are there and you are trying to erase it, and there is a person dear to you next to you who is trying to put it with you In a dream, it is a strong love and a good relationship between you, but sometimes it is a sign that you are in trouble and this person is trying to save you from it. As for burning certain parts of the body in a man’s dream, it is a sign of the presence of many psychological crises and disorders, or that the dreamer is far from God. - The Most High - and about worship and obedience, and it must be reformed. Same. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Interpretation of a dream about lighting a fire in the house. And if you see that someone is lighting it in her house and the woman is trying to extinguish it or calls on people to help her extinguish it, this is evidence of the spread of strife among people and the person responsible for it. Those temptations. He is the same person who lit it, which indicates the spread of heresies. And when she sees that she sees a fire in her house, this is evidence of some changes and disturbances in the woman’s life. She dreams of a fire in the house and tries to put it out. When she sees that he is trying to frustrate her, he refuses to change, or he insists on practicing some customs. unwanted things and he does not care to stay away from them. But when you are inside the house and fumes, smoke and flames come out of it, this is a sign of the emergence of many financial problems and crises, and God knows best and knows best. Sources:- 1- The Book of Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifah, Beirut, 2000.2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin, research by Basil Brady, Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.

She dreams of a fire in the house and tries to put it out when she sees that he is trying to frustrate her, refuses to change, or insists on practicing some unwanted habits and does not care to stay away from them. But when she is inside the house and fumes, smoke and flames come out of it, this is a sign of the emergence of many financial problems and crises, and God knows best. Sources: - 1- The Book of Speech in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad bin Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifah, Beirut, 2000. 2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin, Basil Brady’s research, Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.

preview.html: Cutting hair in a dream is one of those strange dreams whose meaning we do not understand or what exactly it shows. It is something pleasant for some and unpleasant for others, but in reality it shows renewal and change. But seeing it in a dream is confusing. Does this indicate good changes in our lives as well? It indicates unpleasant things that may happen to us in the near future? If this dream comes to you, you can read this article in an encyclopedia to learn about its interpretation by scholars such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream by Ibn SirinFor men, Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream according to the following cases: If the dreamer finds that he is cutting his hair in a dream and changes it This means that he will undergo a radical change in his life, whether on a professional or emotional level. Ibn Sirin also interpreted this dream as the person cutting his hair, and this in reality shows that he wants to end and loosen the chains that surround him. In the event that the dreamer finds himself at the time Hajj and cutting his hair, this indicates the kindness and approach of resourcefulness in reality. In the case of cutting hair in a dream outside the period of Hajj, this is his interpretation for the rich due to lack of money in reality, but for the poor, its interpretation is better and indicates the repayment of the debt. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explains that cutting hair In a dream, it indicates that something disappointing will happen to the dreamer. If the dreamer finds that there is someone pulling his hair in a dream, this means that he is facing problems in reality. Anyone who dreams that someone he does not know is cutting his hair, this is the interpretation that the dreamer wants to change his life. In a positive way. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a married woman: Whoever sees in a dream that she is cutting her hair, this indicates that the married woman will become pregnant soon. If a married woman finds in a dream that she has become more beautiful after cutting her hair, then this actually indicates happiness and kindness for the dreamer. Among the interpretations The other interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a married woman is that it indicates that the woman has already grown old. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a woman finds in the vision that she has become beautiful after cutting her hair, this indicates that in reality she will surrender to a girl. If the dreamer sees that her husband is Who cuts her hair, this actually explains the end of the problems between them, if they exist in reality. Seeing a pregnant woman’s hair being cut in a dream, if it is long, means that in reality she will give birth to a boy. Seeing a pregnant woman cutting her hair in a dream heralds goodness and that her pain and suffering It will end soon. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone she does not know is cutting her hair, this means that she will soon communicate in reality or that her wedding date is approaching if she is engaged. Seeing an unmarried girl cutting her hair in a dream indicates Also to the success that she will achieve in reality in her studies or professionally. Seeing hair cut in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the problems that the dreamer suffers from, as well as her tension in her life in general. If the dreamer sees her hair cut in

title: Interpretation of dreams to see a ladder in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ladder in a dream: A person by nature has many dreams, which sometimes require their interpretation to find out whether they are good or not and what is their interpretation. He knows that a dream is a group of fantasies that a person sees in his dream, and it may be the real vision or the devil’s interpretation as well. . And each dream has a different interpretation according to the dreamer’s condition, and here we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a staircase in a dream. Seeing a staircase in a dream for a single woman. There are some dreams that are common among people and that many people dream of and interpret to see whether it is good news for them or not, so the girl A single woman has many dreams, including seeing a staircase in a dream, which we will discuss as follows: If an unmarried girl sees a staircase in her dream, this indicates the fulfillment of her desires and a sign of success if she climbs it. As for descending the stairs, this is evidence of failure. But if the staircase is too long, This indicates marriage and a happy life with her husband. Interpretation of dreams to see a ladder in a dream, just as a ladder indicates rising among people or promotion at work. See also the interpretation of a dream of seeing rings in a dream for a married woman Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a ladder in a dream, among the dreams that a person sees In a dream, there is a ladder in more than one condition and shape, and one can ascend or descend from it, and each condition has a specific interpretation, as the ladder is known as a medium used to move from bottom to top or vice versa. Therefore, we explain the following: A staircase in a dream indicates knowledge, advancement, and promotion, as well as good luck and success in the future. Sometimes peace indicates the presence of some dangers, but the dreamer has all the strength to face difficulties and dangers. Peace indicates a generous and loyal husband. Interpretation of dreams of seeing a staircase in The dream is a sign of kindness and livelihood that will soon come to the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also the interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dream about a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a wooden ladder in a dream, especially since the difference in seeing the dream is known from one person to another depending on the dreamer’s condition, so that the ladder comes in Dreams come in more than one shape and type, including a wooden staircase, which some may see and have many. Implications. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a ladder in a dream, a wooden ladder in a dream indicates a high position that the dreamer will gain at work in the near future. It also indicates the abundance of food and goodness, which is from a lawful source. It also indicates that the dreamer is trying to achieve his dreams and will succeed. Interpretation of a dream about seeing A ladder in a dream, sometimes a wooden ladder indicates a job opportunity if the dreamer is not working. See also the interpretation of a dream about snoring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about stairs for a married woman. A married woman sees many dreams that she interprets and knows what they indicate and whether it is good news for her or not. Seeing peace is a common dream that has many meanings and connotations depending on the dreamer’s condition, and it has been interpreted for a married woman as follows: Interpretation of dreams to see a ladder in a dream If a married woman sees a ladder in her dream, this indicates some

title: Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, the scholar Ibn Sirin, one of the leading scholars in the field of dream interpretation. Another is clear information, not a possibility, and that it comes true in reality, but all of these dreams are considered a possibility and an expectation. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream according to the interpretation. By Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin continued to interpret the vision of slaughtering a sheep in a dream as one of the good visions that symbolize the death of sadness, the approaching slumber, and a change in the dreamer’s circumstances for the better soon. This vision for an unmarried dreamer symbolizes the dreamer’s desire to Marrying a girl with good morals. As for what this vision means for the married man, it indicates that he already has children. This vision for the poor dreamer is good news for him, an abundance of food and changed circumstances, and it may indicate that he will find a new job opportunity, and God knows best. Among the indications What Ibn Sirin mentioned in this vision is that it indicates good character, piety, and good deeds that the dreamer performs in reality. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that this vision is good news for achieving what the dreamer wants in reality, as it is a sign of repentance to God and avoiding sins and disobedience. If the dreamer sees one of his family members or friends slaughtering a sheep, then this vision indicates that person’s visit to the Holy House of God. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream, Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi also interpreted this vision as an indication of the end of the crisis that the dreamer is going through in reality, as well as An indication of the abundance of food. If the dreamer sees slaughtering a sheep, cooking its meat, and eating it in a dream, this vision suggests that the dreamer is going through positive changes in reality, which may include obtaining a new job opportunity or marriage, and God knows best. As for seeing a sheep slaughtered and eating its meat raw, this vision is not It is good as an indication of sins committed by a person, such as backbiting and gossiping. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the corpse of a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a sheep being slaughtered in a dream and blood oozing from it, then this vision expresses a change in the dreamer’s circumstances for the better and the end of the problems he faces in reality. If you see a sheep being skinned In a dream, this vision indicates the oppression that the dreamer and her family are suffering from in reality. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream for a married woman: This vision is considered promising for the married woman to become pregnant soon, if she has not given birth before. In general, this dream expresses the end of crises Which the dreamer experiences on earth and the appearance of happiness and comfort. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a corpse in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman slaughtering a sheep in a dream is a good vision for her, and an indication of the approaching date of her birth, and God knows best. In the case of black fear, this vision indicates a legitimate source of livelihood, If you see a small sheep, this vision indicates good offspring. It is difficult to narrow down the scope of interpretations associated with a specific dream, because there are many side details that can appear in the dream and completely change its meaning.
